basics.name: Obai Gasmalla
basics.label: Assistant Data Consultant
basics.summary: Assistant Data Consultant with experience in machine learning, data engineering, cloud computing, and stakeholder engagement, focusing on delivering scalable solutions and forecasting models for infrastructure projects.

work.name: WSP
work.summary: Data Consultant in the Intelligent Infrastructure department, working on machine learning and data engineering projects. Involves large dataset handling, forecasting, statistical analysis, and stakeholder engagement.
highlights: Leading the design and implementation of a technical ETL pipeline using Databricks and Azure cloud solutions.
Supporting Transport for Wales (TfWRL) commercial analytics and service performance integration into the Azure cloud platform.
Involved in machine learning and data engineering projects focused on cloud computing.

Provided data insights and managed challenges for National Highways.
